trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the return value of a method in a Windows Runtime component.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Windows 运行时组件中方法的返回值名称。

trans-unit.source: In a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component, all the parameters of a method and the return value must have names.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]的方法和返回值的所有参数，组件必须具有名称。

trans-unit.source: By default, [Winmdexp.exe (Windows Runtime Metadata Export Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/winmdexp-exe-windows-runtime-metadata-export-tool.md) gives the return value the name "value".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， [Winmdexp.exe （Windows 运行时元数据导出工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/winmdexp-exe-windows-runtime-metadata-export-tool.md)为名称"value"的返回值。

trans-unit.source: When you use a component in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app written in JavaScript, you can use this name to retrieve the return value.
trans-unit.target: 当使用中的组件[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]以 JavaScript 编写，可以使用此名称可检索返回值的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose a component defines a method that has a return value and two `out` parameters (`ByRef` parameters with the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.OutAttribute> attribute in Visual Basic):
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设一个组件定义一个方法包含返回值和第二个`out`参数 (`ByRef`参数<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.OutAttribute>在 Visual Basic 中的属性):

trans-unit.source: When you call the function from JavaScript, you can access the return value by its default name (`value`):
trans-unit.target: 当从 JavaScript 中调用函数时，你可以通过其默认名称来访问返回的值 (`value`):

trans-unit.source: You must give the return value a different name if you already have a parameter named "value".
trans-unit.target: 如果你已有一个名为"value"参数，则必须为返回的值不同的名称。

trans-unit.source: Or you might simply want to use a more meaningful name (such as "average" in this example).
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可能只是想要使用一个更有意义的名称 （例如"平均值"在此示例中）。

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.ReturnValueNameAttribute> attribute to your method and specify a new name.
trans-unit.target: 应用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.ReturnValueNameAttribute>属性到你的方法，并指定新名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the return value.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.ReturnValueNameAttribute" /> class, and specifies the name of the return value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.ReturnValueNameAttribute" /> 类的新实例，并指定返回值的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name that was specified for the return value of a method in a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] component.
trans-unit.target: 获取 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 组件中为方法返回值指定的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method's return value.
